Class yii\helpers\Markdown

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\helpers\Markdown » yii\helpers\BaseMarkdown
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Markdown provides an ability to transform markdown into HTML.

Basic usage is the following:

php $myHtml = Markdown::process($myText);

If you want to configure the parser:

php $myHtml = Markdown::process($myText, [ 'fn_id_prefix' => 'footnote_', ]);

Note that in order to use this helper you need to install "michelf/php-markdown" Composer package.

For more details please refer to PHP Markdown library documentation.
